Name: Slider
Description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the parts of a slider. It will render an input for each thumb when used within a form to ensure events propagate correctly.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: defaultValue
PropData.Description: The value of the slider when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the slider.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: The controlled value of the slider. Must be used in conjunction with onValueChange.

PropData.Name: onValueChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the value changes.

PropData.Name: onValueCommit
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the value changes.

PropData.Name: name
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the value changes at the end of an interaction. Useful when you only need to capture a final value e.g. to update a backend service.

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the slider.

PropData.Name: inverted
PropData.Description: The reading direction of the slider. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

PropData.Name: min
PropData.Description: The minimum value for the range.

PropData.Name: max
PropData.Description: The maximum value for the range.

PropData.Name: minStepsBetweenThumbs
PropData.Description: The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.

SubComponentData.Name: Track
SubComponentData.Description: The track that contains the Slider.Range.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponentData.Name: Range
SubComponentData.Description: The range part. Must live inside Slider.Track.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponentData.Name: Thumb
SubComponentData.Description: A draggable thumb. You can render multiple thumbs.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.
